member.name: M:Gizmox.WebGUI.Common.Interfaces.IContextClipboard.SetDataObject(Gizmox.WebGUI.Forms.IDataObject,System.Boolean,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Attempts to place data on the system Clipboard the specified number of times and with the specified delay between attempts, optionally leaving the data on the Clipboard after the application exits.
member.param: true if you want data to remain on the Clipboard after this application exits; otherwise, false.
The data to place on the Clipboard.
The number of times to attempt placing the data on the Clipboard.
The number of milliseconds to pause between attempts.
member.exception: Data could not be placed on the Clipboard. This typically occurs when the Clipboard is being used by another process.
The current thread is not in single-threaded apartment (STA) mode. Add the to your application's Main method.
retryTimes is less than zero.-or-retryDelay is less than zero.

member.name: M:Gizmox.WebGUI.Common.Interfaces.IContextClipboard.GetDataObject
member.summary: Retrieves the data that is currently on the system Clipboard.
member.returns: An that represents the data currently on the Clipboard, or null if there is no data on the Clipboard.
member.exception: Data could not be retrieved from the Clipboard. This typically occurs when the Clipboard is being used by another process.
The current thread is not in single-threaded apartment (STA) mode and the property value is true. Add the to your application's Main method.

member.name: M:Gizmox.WebGUI.Common.Interfaces.IContextClipboard.Clear
member.summary: Removes all data from the Clipboard.
member.exception: The current thread is not in single-threaded apartment (STA) mode. Add the to your application's Main method.
The Clipboard could not be cleared. This typically occurs when the Clipboard is being used by another process.
